alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 30 at 7:28AM EDT until April 30 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Glades County in southern Florida... * Until 745 AM EDT. * At 728 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Brighton Seminole Reservation, or 7 miles southwest of Buckhead Ridge, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Indian Prairie Canal Mouth. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
